name: Selenium Auto Apply
description: Automate Job Applications for position listings on Angel.co using Selenium WebDriver. The aggregated position listings on job boards are a perfect place to apply for each job methodically and sequentially. Selenium WebDriver Auto Apply is a program that automates filtering search criteria, sending a note to a hiring manager, and clicking the submit button.

name: Ugly Dog Store
description: Full stack website.  With a team of other engineers, I crafted the Product Overview Module for the front end. I created a server using Node.js, and populated a PostgreSQL database with a legacy codebase.  Ultimately deployed server and database on two seperate AWS EC2 instances.

name: Coffee Finder
description: Simple mobile application that allows users to search for coffee shops based on loaction.  The app provides detailed information on each shop, with the functionality to call or get directions to the chosen coffee shop directly from the app.

name: Crypto Charter
description: A single page site which displays the last 30 days closing prices of cryptocurrencies.
